trans-unit.source: Represents a proposed removal of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> from a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> within a running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma proposta de remover um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> dentro de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho em execução.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the index of the activity being removed when you remove the activity using the workflow changes.
trans-unit.target: Indica o índice da atividade sendo removida quando você remove a atividade usando as alterações de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Root activity from which the activity was removed.
trans-unit.target: Atividade raiz da qual a atividade foi removida.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.RemovedActivityAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance of original <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> being removed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a instância do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> original sendo removido.

trans-unit.source: The instance of the original <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> being removed.
trans-unit.target: A instância do original <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que está sendo removido.

trans-unit.source: Gets index of the removed <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> with the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities" /> collection of the parent <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> removido com a coleção <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities" /> do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> pai.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> being removed.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que está sendo removido.
